document.full_text: chris bosh discarded his 'third man' label to shoot 34 points and lead miami to a 96-85 win over the chicago bulls on sunday, giving the heat a 2-1 lead in the eastern conference championship series.
document.title: bosh fired up as heat bash bulls
lines_and_colors: chris bosh discarded his 'third man' label to shoot 34 points and lead miami to a 96-85 win over the chicago bulls on sunday, giving the heat a 2-1 lead in the eastern conference championship series.
